column11: Generate structured multi-layer Mermaid diagrams (.mmd files) from natural language. Creates files with YAML frontmatter, updates _index.yaml, supports L0/L1/L2 layers with drill-down. Use this INSTEAD of inline mermaid generation when the user wants organized, linked diagrams. Launch as a Task with parameters: description, type (flowchart|state|architecture|sequence), layer (L0|L1|L2), feature, parent (for L1/L2).
Update an existing Mermaid diagram from natural language instructions. Preserves frontmatter, relationships, and click links. Launch as a Task with parameters: diagram_id, feature, instructions.
